snippet: The other thing I noticed - and, mind you, this could all change by Saturday or even in an hour - is that there is a conservative attitude leaching into the style of the clothes.
abstract: The other thing I noticed - and, mind you, this could all change by Saturday or even in an hour - is that there is a conservative attitude leaching into the style of the clothes.
lead_paragraph: When I got into a cab the other morning and told the driver, "Lincoln Center, please," he sort of floored me with his reply. "You want the fashion shows?"

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
